caption: Relating to the availability and use of airway clearance devices at public school campuses.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill requires Texas school districts to provide airway clearance devices at each campus, particularly near food consumption areas. Schools must ensure trained staff are present when students gather. The devices must be obtained through donations or designated funds. This bill affects all students equally, including Chinese students, but does not specifically target any ethnic group.

Summary (Chinese):
该法案要求德克萨斯州学区在每个校区配备气道清理设备，特别是在学生就餐区域附近。学校必须确保有经过培训的工作人员在学生聚集时在场。这些设备必须通过捐赠或指定资金获得。该法案平等地影响所有学生，包括中国学生，但并不特别针对任何族裔群体。

2. Health & Human Services Committee
